body_html:
With cuda 9.2 and tensorflow-gpu 1.8 I cannot build tensorflow

declared output 'external/local_config_cuda/cuda/cuda/lib/libcudnn.so.7' is a dangling symbolic link

The symlink exists

Versions:

Ubuntu 17.10
cuda 9.2
cudnn 7.1.4
tensorflow-gpu 1.8.0

body:
With cuda 9.2 and tensorflow-gpu 1.8 I cannot build tensorflow

declared output 'external/local_config_cuda/cuda/cuda/lib/libcudnn.so.7' is a dangling symbolic link


The symlink exists

Versions:

Ubuntu 17.10
cuda 9.2
cudnn 7.1.4
tensorflow-gpu 1.8.0
